sourcesContent:
<template>
    <label :for="idInput">{{ labelName }}</label>
    <input type="email" :placeholder="placeholder" :id="idInput">
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'FormInputEmail',
        props: {
            placeholder: String,
            idInput: String,
            labelName: String
        },
        data() {
            return {
                placeholder: this.placeholder,
                labelName: this.labelName
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    input {
        width: 100%;
        height: 52px;
        padding-left: 14px;
        color: #2C2738;
        border: 1px solid #DBE2EA;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 8px rgba(44, 39, 56, 0.04);
        border-radius: 6px;
        outline: none;

        &:focus {
            border: 2px solid #0880AE;
        }

        &::placeholder {
            color: #7C9CBF;
        }
    }

    label {
        display: block;
        margin-bottom: 5px;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 21px;
        color: #756F86;
    }
</style>
